choices: You find a shrinker and shrink somebody
Somebody finds a shrinker and shrinks you
You find a shrinker and shrink yourself
Somebody finds a shrinker and shrinks somebody else
You find a shrinker, somebody else finds a shrinker, and you shrink each other
1.content: Well, I know you are anxious to get started on your journey into infinitesimalia. (Ha! Didn't know there was a scientific term for it, did ya?)
1.title: Start Here

11.content: Only two stories here, so far, but when more are added, I will change the numbers to titles...
11.title: You find a shrinker and shrink somebody

111.content:
It wasn't what I set out to do. It just happened.

You see, I found this strange gun lying on the ground in my front yard. (How it got there I will NEVER know.) The gun had a little dial on it labeled "Turn this to how small you want to shrink something and then pull the trigger". (It was printed in very small print.)

Well, who would believe something like that? I thought it was a joke. So I turned the dial down to "pretty darn tiny" and pointed the shrinker gun at my wienerdog, Pete. I pulled the trigger and a green ray flared out of the gun barrel and zapped Pete. I threw the gun down. I was really surprised.

At first I thought Pete had disappeared. Then I heard this tiny yapping in the grass. I knelt down and there was poor little Pete, and I do mean "little". He was no bigger than a charm on a charm bracelet.

I tried to pick him up really carefully just using two fingers, but I guess he was just too small for that. He gave out a tiny little "yelp!" and I could see that he was ready for doggie heaven.

I felt terrible and thought about throwing the shrinker gun away, smashing it, burying it in the woods... But then I thought, Noooo... I could have some fun with this thing. I'll just be careful not to turn the dial so far down.

I got a matchbox and put Pete's little corpse in it and buried him in the backyard. I said a little prayer over Pete's grave and I made a solemn vow. "Pete," I said. "Your death will be avenged." I'm not sure what I meant by that, since I was the one who killed him, but it made me feel better.
111.title: I shrunk my wienerdog

choices: "Oh my, @#$#@! What have you done to me?"
She wants you to do that to the other arm.
1111.content:
I was still stunned and in shock as I stood in the stark sunlight shining right down on Pete's grave site. It was like the sun was trying to send me a message or something. Oh well. I don't believe in stage lighting cues.

I stared down at the shrinking gun, letting it grow warm in my hands from the heat of my excitement and nervousness.

That's odd, I thought to myself thoughtfully.

But there it was, in fine, fine, minuscule print: "Partial Shrinking."

What on earth does that mean?

From the sidewalk a few feet behind me, I could hear the panting sounds of the neighbor lady hobble-jogging past my house. I turned around, ignoring the loud party mix of danger theme songs universal to television shows, gun in my hand.

"Hi, Neighbor Lady!"

She stopped in midrun; don't know why she'd STOP if she thought I had a gun. She screamed.

"Oh, honey, this ole thang? It's just a toy."

I twirled it around. I threw it up in the air, caught it on my nose, let it slide smoothly down my shoulder and arm, hopped it onto my knee, bopped it to my toes, and then kicked it back into my hand. Globetrotters, watch out. Here I come!

The woman from next door smiled at me like she thought I was crazy, but cool. "Can you do that again?" she said breathily, and not from being too unhealthy to jog for ten minutes.

"Ooh, yeah! You know I can do it, girl."

I tossed it up into the air. It hit my nose. Fell to the ground. Bounced up in the air again. Went off prematurely.

And shrank poor Miss Abernathy's left bicep.
1111.title: Neighbor Lady

choices: make jessica younger ( i know its a shrinking story) couldnt resist
112.content:
I had been given tickets to the MTV Music Awards.
Upon arrival, I spot Jessica Simpson. I decide, that I am going to shrink her a bit. Jessica stands about 5'3. Feeling mischievous, I decide to shrink her 5 inches. Her clothes loosen and her flip flops grow a bit. I chuckle at this, as she attempts to adjust her clothing. After a few minutes, she leaves. Upon her return, she is wearing a different outfit. The outfit is a sundress and pink flip flops. I think to myself...( This 25 year old hottie, is dressed like a preteen, how hilarious is that.)
I look around and debate on what I should do next.
112.title: little Jessica

1121.content:
You spot a girl in the crowd about seventeen heading to the toilets, at the same time you spot an empty hamster cage on a shelf, a develish grin creeps across your lips as you say to yourself, "I've always wanted hamsters". You take the cage and find the girl vomiting into the bog and wait till she finishes before shrinking her to 5 inches and popping her into the cage, you explain to the girl that she's your pet now and that as long as she plays along she'll be just fine.
You the gather up her clothes and sell them to a partier who's just been puked on.
An idea hits you, "I could make a living out of this" you say.
1121.title: next victim

113.content:
I found this shriker in my locker! And immediately I had a devious plan in mind!

There was this jerk jock Wolf named Wolfgang in my school he was always picking on me...So at sundown I waited under the bleachers until the football game was over then...I struck! As Wolfgang made his way to the locker room I shrunk him!
113.title: The Incredible Shrinking Furry!

The Shrinker agrees to help, but demands you first pay his beer tab. You ask the bartender how much it is, and he tells you that the tab has been going on for fifty years, and the Shrinker now owes five hundred million gift points.

So you....
114.title: You shrink Steve Ellen

choices: I don't trust you, since you don't have enough.
I trust you.  Besides, I want a lot of gps.
1141.content: When you tell him to get lost, he then offers you a million gps a year. Only if you shrink Steve. You ask him if he has enough gps to do that. He tells you no, but he'll make enough to do that soon. So you would say...
1141.title: A Million Gps A Year Offer

choices: You remain hidden and watch what happens next
115.content:
You creep into your neighbours' backyard and spy on their cute 17 year old daughter Alice, who is currently swimming in the pool. You always had a crush on Alice, she was kind, innocent and pure. Not to mention pretty! But you never had the courage to ask her out, and despite you two being neighbours you don't speak alot aside from the occasional polite greetings whenever you see her every morning. Though you always wanted to have her! Perhaps today is your lucky day?

You aim the shrink ray at her and fire. Alice quickly shrinks out of her bikini to around 3 inches of height. The poor little girl panicked and splashed around in the water, "HELP! HELP ME!" she screamed in her high pitched voice.

choices: Look for somebody else to shrink.
1152.content:
For whatever reason you think it's better to see if she'll get out of the pool by herself without you coming to her rescue. After a minute of splashing around in panic Alice calmed down, swam to the ledge and got out of the pool. Alice was frightened by her new perspective, everything looked so gigantic and menacing now. The pool was like a giant lake and her bikini parts that remained floating in the water were the size of boats. The grass blades were almost as tall as her! She was also naked and vulnerable to attacks by bugs or possibly other animals.

"What happened to me? This is not good... I gotta find mom and dad!" The 3 inch tall naked girl thought. She ran through the grass towards the house and banged on the backdoor, "Mom! Dad! Open up! Please!!!" Alice squeaked. Suddenly out of the bushes came out Monty, Alice's pet dog. He ran to Alice to take a closer look at her, "Monty! It's me, Alice! Help me get mom and dad's attention!" The tiny teen said and pointed at the door. Unfortunately Monty did not recognize his owner and thought Alice was a toy, so he caught her with his mouth. Poor little Alice screamed as the dog ran off with her into the neighbourhood.

Oh dear... What are you gonna do now?
1152.title: You remain hidden and watch what happens next

12.content: Four stories in this section. Only room for one more! When you add it, I will change "5" to your title...
12.title: Somebody finds a shrinker and shrinks you

121.content:
It was lunchtime. I grabbed a table and waited for my girlfriend, Darlene, to go through the line. She came over with her tray and sat down across from me. I already had my brown bag open. It was my usual lunch - baloney on white bread with mayonnaise and a banana.

Darlene pushed her hand in my face and wiggled her finger. "Look at this cool ring I found."

"Looks like a crackerjack prize to me," I said, and bit into my sandwich.

"No, I think it's a diamond. It sparkles." She kept gazing at it and rubbing it. Her eyes had a faraway look.

"Hey!" I said, "Snap out of it!"

She shook her head and opened her eyes wide. "It's so sparkly."

"Yeah, well don't hypnotize yourself with it."

"Do you think that's what was happening?" And she giggled. She was always making fun of things I said, and maybe sometimes I was joking, but this time I was serious.

I frowned at her. "I saw your eyes. You were going into a trance."

She just found that funny. "Sure... Booga booga booga..." and she rubbed the ring at me and mocked me. I couldn't resist her charms. I felt my mouth twitch into a smile and I knew I would be laughing with her. But then something happened that wiped the smiles off our faces.

A green light like a laser beam shot out of the ring and hit my banana. Before our eyes the banana made a little squeaking noise and shrunk down to the size of a crayon.

We just stared at it for a moment, then started talking at the same time. "What was THAT?! Holy cow! Did you see that? Your banana shrunk!"

Well, we couldn't figure it out. Why a ring would shrink a banana was beyond my scientific knowledge. Darlene said "Let's ask Mr. Thompson (science teacher) about it."

"Noooo..." I said. "Let's keep this to ourselves." The wheels were turning in my mind. and there were suddenly lots of new possibilities in my life.
121.title: My girlfriend shrunk my banana

1211.content:
The bell rang and Darlene got up to put away her tray. At the door I asked her; "Don't you want to give that ring to me for safekeeping?"

She laughed, "Why would it be safe with you? It's safe right here on my finger."

"Well, be careful, Darlene. Don't do anything dumb with it."

She laughed back at me over her shoulder as she flounced away, sticking her tongue out and popping her eyes. I shook my head sadly.

I am the reasonable one in the couple. Darlene is the flake. She's fun, but uncontrolled fun can be dangerous. I was Darlene's contol. At least, that's the way I saw it. I think she knew she needed my stability to counterbalance her flightiness. But I never heard her actually say that. She was just too busy having fun.

I went on to Math and didn't think any more about the ring until the screaming started in the hallway. Of course, everybody ran to the door to see what was going on.

I need to tell you a little more about Darlene so you will understand what happened next.

Darlene has a nice figure and I love it, but she doesn't have what you would call a "big" chest. Don't get me wrong. I love Darlene's small girls. They are soft, round, firm, and perky. No complaints from me. But nobody describing Darlene's chest would use adjectives like big, huge, large, outstanding, and so on.

Like I say, it doesn't matter to me, but apparently it does to Darlene. I have often detected little signs of her envy of girls with big chests - snide remarks, frowns, that kind of thing. Now back to the screams in the hallway.

If there was a prize in our school for the girl with the biggest chest, the trophy would go to Marba Chanelle. So it was shocking to see her running down the hall and instead of the usual bounce show - nothing! I mean she might as well have been a boy. No wonder she was screaming.

And it wasn't just her. Four of the biggest girls in school were running right behind her, and it was a bounce-free environment. A babble of voices erupted around me and questions were flying. What? How? Why? Who?

Uh-oh! I thought. I had an idea of who the "who" might be - a certain envious impulsive female who had recently found an interesting ring.
1211.title: Melons to Marbles

12111.content:
The flat-chested girls were taken to the principal's office and the commotion in the hallway begin to subside as everybody drifted back to their classrooms.

An announcement came over the speakers: "Darlene Holmes, report to the principal's office." I paused while entering my class and instead turned and ran down the hall.

I intercepted Darlene just as she was about to push open the door to the office. "What the heck did you do?"

I could see she was pleased with herself. It was all a big joke to her, but she slipped the ring into my hand. "Hold it for me. I'll see you tonight."

After supper, I went across the street to Darlene's house. They have a big old-fashioned porch with a swing and two rocking chairs. Darlene was in the swing and I sat down next to her. "What did Mr. Bergman (the principal) say?"

"Oh, I just told him I didn't know what happened. Did you watch the news?"

"No. It was on TV?"

"Yeah. School is closed tomorrow."

"What!"

"Yeah, they don't know what caused it, so school is closed while they check it out. They want to see if there are any toxic fumes or anything."

"Darlene, let's just tell them about the ring."

"Stevie, do you want me to go to jail?"

"You won't go to jail... Will you?"

"I don't want to find out. Do you have the ring?"

I had it in my pocket, but I didn't want to give it to her. She was dangerous with that ring. So I reluctantly told her "I think I better keep the ring."

Her face hardened. "That's my ring, Stevie. Give it back."

"Darlene, look at what happened today. Just let me hold on to it."

"No, Stevie. Give me my ring."
12111.title: Who gets the ring?

121111.content:
"It's not YOUR ring, Darlene. You found it. It belongs to somebody else."

But Darlene had no use for my technicalities. She turned in the porch swing to look hard at me. "Stevie, it's my ring now and I want it back. Give it to me." She had her hand out, waiting.

But I had to be firm. I was the responsible half of the couple. "No, Darlene."

She stood up from the swing. "You know what will happen if you don't give me that ring, don't you?"

A chill ran though me. She was threatening to break up with me. But this is important to us, I thought. I touched her arm. "It's for the best, Darlene. You'll thank me later for keeping the ring."

She snatched her arm away from me. "I ... don't ... think so." She opened her front door, went in, closed it, and I heard the distinct "click!" of the deadbolt being locked.

I got up and started back to my house. What did I care? Let her break up with me... Then I thought about my life before Darlene -- the lonely geek with no girlfriend. I was just about out of her yard when I stopped and rethought the situation. Was it worth it to lose her over the stupid ring?

I turned around and trudged back up the walk to her door. I knocked. The door opened a crack. Her hand came out, palm up. I dropped the ring in it. She opened the door all the way and put her arms around my neck. "Thanks, Stevie. I love you."

"I love you," I said, and we kissed.

"Call me in the morning," she said, smiling. She was happy now with her victory over me.

"Okay," I said. See ya."

That night, going to bed, I let out a big sigh. Being a little love slave wrapped around Darlene's thumb wasn't good for my ego. But I didn't want to go back to being a lonely geek. Why did she always win? Just once I'd like to call her bluff. But she was so cute. What if I pushed her away and she ended up with someone else? No. I couldn't risk that. It would kill me. I might as well try to enjoy being a slave.
121111.title: Love Slave

choices: He puts on the ring and gets away from Darlene.
He lies and tells her someone else has it.
121112.content:
I knew I had to do what was best for the community. Sizing up Darlene with my most serious gaze, I drew in a deep breath, looked away and down at my lap. I clasped my hands, nervous, hoping this worked.

"Darlene, I'm sorry. But...I don't have the ring anymore."

Darlene's normally kind, beautiful eyes narrowed hatefully at me. Her nostrils flared as she indignantly cried out, "How could you lose it? What were you thinking?"

Such trust.

She stood up so quickly, the swing rocked violently from side to side and back and forth all at once.

"I don't believe you. Give me the ring!"

I gulped. There was no way I could pass Darlene without shoving her out of my way. And as angry as she was, whew!

I had been waiting to do it, hoping I could try it out later, in private. But now it seemed like the inevitable thing to do.
121112.title: Should he put on the ring?

1211121.content: he imediatle began to shrink infront of her to get away for her. hes now bugsize and notices that she is taking off her shoes now and showing him her smelly white socks .
1211121.title: trapped

choices: she toys with them at first
12112.content: sudenly she uses the ring on the 4 girls and shrinks them to the size of ants.
12112.title: shrunk

122.content: It was a marvelous summer Friday! The sun was shining, the temperature was 95 degrees, and the beach was loaded with beautiful babes. You were on your beach towel, tanning, in your black swim trunks, when this gorgeous girl comes over to you. You look at her: 2-piece bathing suit, 5'5", thin, huge rack, gorgeous stomach, marvelous face... you felt like you were in heaven. The girl just giggles and says "Hehe, you're a cutie! Would you like a massage?" You really think this is too good to be true, but you say "Sure, why not?" You just lie there, and let the girl do her magic. She was quite good, you had to admit. She massaged you practically all over! She did your feet, your legs, your stomach, your hands, your arms, all around your head, your chest, and she even dared to massage over your swim trunks, and you just let her like the little horny devil you are. As a matter of fact, you were so relaxed by her massaging, you fell asleep. When you awoke, you found yourself...
122.title: Beach of Dreams

You cower, as you are sure that you are about to be splattered all over the sand. As she brings her foot down, she suddenly stops, just an inch above your tiny unclothed body. She then moves her foot, and looks down at you. She then says, “If you think I’m really going to just squash a tiny naked hunk like you, you got sand for brains.”

With that, she scoops you up, and takes you to
12211.title: Your mine

choices: She plays with you between her feet

12212.title: she plays with youbetween her feet

choices: "So Hun, do you want to go swimming with me?"
1222.content: As you slowly begin to regain your senses, you feel yourself in a very relaxed position. It almost feels like you're out in the water tubing. Although, you don't remember getting into the water, and the surface feels too... soft. You open your eyes and look up, seeing the beaming beautiful face of the masseuse staring down at you smiling! You get up, look around, and see that you were laying across her naval, partially in her belly-button. You jump and and begin to run, but the girl quickly picks you up and holds you in front of her face.
1222.title: Big Babe

choices: In the middle of the night
123.content:
It had always been a tradition in my house to leave out a plate of cookies and a glass of milk for Santa Claus. But the tradition ended on that fateful Christmas when Santa shrunk my nuts.

Christmas Eve was a happy time. The tree was trimmed, the gifts were wrapped, and now it was time for bed. "Something for Santa?" I said.

"Yes!" said my sister. "Cookies and milk... and nuts!"

"Nuts!" I said. "Why?" But I knew why. All day we had been playing with the big bowl of nuts on the dining room table.

The pecans were race cars to roll across the floor, wobbling crazily from door to door. The almonds were light, just right for throwing fights. They didn't hurt when they hit. Just watch your eyes.

Hazelnuts, brazil nuts, filberts -- all fun. So it wasn't surprising that the subject of nuts would be bubbling at the top of my sister's mind.

The cookies and milk were set by the fire, along with the big bowl of nuts.

"Goodnight, everybody!" we called out and left, taking Snoopy and Kitty up to our room, where we snuggled in bed with visions of Christmas afloat in our heads.
123.title: Santa Shrunk My Nuts

1231.content:
I don't know what awakened me, some small noise I guess. I arose from my bed and went to the stairs. It was deep in the night and all were asleep, so I very carefully creeped downstairs.

There at the bottom I hid in the shadow. It was Santa! He stood by the fire, warming his back. He picked up two nuts and I heard one of them crack. He ate all the meat, threw the shells in the fire, then emptied the bowl into his big sack.

"No, Santa!" I screamed. "Don't take my nuts!"

Santa put a finger to the side of his nose and up the chimney he arose.

"No, Santa," I sobbed, collapsed on the floor, but I would not be playing with my nuts anymore.

By next morning I was cheerful all over again. We unwrapped the presents and laughed and had fun. The only moment of sadness came when I glanced at that big empty bowl where my nuts used to be. I'll fix you, Santa. Next year -- nothing! No milk! No cookies! Nothing!

And so life goes on, tear to tear, Christmas to Christmas, with or without your nuts.
1231.title: No, Santa! That ain't right!

choices: We met a professor who had a mutant illegal cell shrinking device!
124.content:
"I just love the thinness of the fabric. I adore this sweater. I've got to have it," Aileen gushed.

"It's fab, all right. But it's not your size."

"Oh. Yeah. Thanks for that."

Aileen put the size XXXS sweater on top of the rack, letting it drape awkwardly over top of the rest of the sweaters hanging on the rack. She made a face at the floor manager walking through the aisles between two nearby racks.

"Come on, let's go look over there," Aileen said, jutting a heavily bejewelled finger toward the revolving jewelry case. "Maybe something over there isn't meant for fat people."

"Tell me about it."

Aileen and I both wear clothing in sizes meant for ten year old boys...who like to wear small clothing. It's baggy on us fashionably malnourished twenty-one year olds who have no lives other than shopping, soaps, and dating, although lately, we haven't been able to get a date. People give us weird looks at the club.

We just hate how the fashion industry tries to push off all these size 0, 1, and 2 clothing on us, like we're always supersizing our Mickey D's. Please. We eat our five daily servings of fruit and everything else on the food pyramid, plus vitamins. There's no excuse not to be our size. So why can't we ever find clothing just for us?

It's like as we age, we're shrinking, while the world is growing ever larger around us.

Aileen pulled a frog ring out of the velvety slit it was wedged into. She slipped it on her middle finger, then her thumb.

It fell to the carpeted floor.

"It doesn't fit me. And it's meant for a child!" Aileen wailed, drawing the attention of the store manager, who'd been eyeballing us ever since we entered the small fashion establishment.

I heard a loud rumble. It was my tummy.

I turned to tell the store manager that all was well, but my foot came out of my shoe as a I took a step forward.

Huh?

Oh, yeah. We haven't had our lunch yet. We must have shrunk some more.

You're probably wondering why we are so small, huh?

Well, it all started when...
124.title: Ghost Girls

she steps on you with socks on

1241.title: bug size

Nope. Flight's boring. It gets better, though.
125.content:
I have learned a few good lessons because of my latest escapade, and let me tell you, I will never ever sit down in a seat without looking again.

Why? You ask. Have you seen that oh-so-stupid movie Honey, I shrunk the kids? Or any one of its equally dumb sequels? Well, I haven't, but I suppose that what's wrong with me at this particualr moment in time is pretty close to the movie. Yup. I'm that annoying moving speck you see. I'm hitching rides on microbes I'm so small.

Okay, maybe not that small, but two inches tall is still short. You see, it all started when I woke up.

Yeah, big mistake on my part, that. Anyway, My dad's an archaelogist, and he'd made the most amazing discovery at a dig site we were at in South America. He told me don't touch, as he pulled out the beautiful artifact, and guess what?

The moment he was gone, I was just dying to touch. So what use would the Mayan people have with a shrink ray?

I don't know, but here I am, stowed away in my dad's suitcase in the cargo area, while my parents make a frantic flight back to the states. Yikes, but this sucks. I wish I could blame it on my dad, but, alas, it's my stupidity that caused this.

Great. I'm pitching all around in the plane. Can things get any worse?
125.title: Dad, I shrunk myself. (I'm a total doof)

choices: My summer job at the California Advanced Research Laboratory
13.content: Only two stories so far, but when more are added, then I will change the numbers to match the titles...
13.title: You find a shrinker and shrink yourself

131.content:
I was thrilled to be hired for a summer job at the California Advanced Research Laboratory, but I couldn't help but wonder: Is this job at CARL just some flimsy setup for another one of those weird shrinking stories?

But how could that be? I was the character, not the author. I couldn't setup myself, could I? Or could I? I was glad I would be working at CARL that summer where questions like that had a reasonable chance of being answered.

Needless to say, summer arrived very quickly and I found myself alone in a lab one afternoon poking around in all that exotic scientific equipment. They should never have trusted me. When I found the giant chrome projector with the words "Shrinker Ray Prototype" scribbled on the side with a Sharpie - well, my curiosity got the better of me. "Where's that ON/OFF switch?"

The switch was part of a big control panel - adjust this, adjust that. I have never been one to read the manual. I think it's better just to start turning knobs and throwing switches. Sooner or later you figure out how something works. And if you don't, Best Buy has a very generous return policy.

Of course, this giant chrome shrinker gun didn't come from Best Buy, so I hesitated for a few seconds before I threw the switch.

At first nothing happened, then a low humming sound swept quickly up into the ultrasonic frequencies and a blinding green ray flashed right in my face. I had the sick feeling of falling and then, there I was on the floor, only a few inches tall.

I rubbed my hands together and laughed heartily. "I knew it was a setup! The job, the lab, the whole shtick! Just to get me shrunk! Hahahahahahahaha!"

I don't think I was in my right mind right then. Maybe shrinking the brain has an effect on your ability to think clearly?

On the other hand, does the mind have a size? You can't see it or touch it, so maybe everybody has the same size mind no matter how big or small their brain might be? Once again, I was glad to be at the California Advanced Research Laboratory, where answers to questions like that just might be found.
131.title: I Shrink Myself At C.A.R.L.

1311.content:
I heard pounding footsteps and smelled fish... Doctor Hookenline!

It had to be him walking down the hall. One of the projects at C.A.R.L. was developing a new breed of goldfish that would be tiny enough to seal in small vials of water that could be made into jewelry, a brooch for a woman to pin on her dress. Doctor Hookenline was chief investigator on the goldfish project.

He entered the lab before I could hide and spotted me running across the floor. "Vass is diss? A leetle teeny man?"

He snatched a goldfish net out of his back pocket and neatly trapped me with it. "Why... It's leetle Stevie! Why you so small, boy? Hee hee hee!"

"Doctor Hookenline! How do I get big again? I accidentally triggered the shrinker machine."

"Ja, serves you right for being too nosey. Don't be so nosey, Stevie."

"All right, Doc, I won't be so nosey. Just make me big again."

"No, Stevie. I got a job for you to do first. This is very lucky for me, you being so small now. You just right for the job." He scooped me up and dropped me in a specimen bottle.

I heard him rattling around with the lab equipment, then he picked up the specimen bottle and dumped me into a new container -- a terrarium. It was spacious - for little me - and had a soft layer of green moss, a few plants, and... "Doctor Hookenline! What's that?"

"Relax, Stevie. He won't bite you. Hee hee! That's a red-spotted salamander. He's pretty, huh?"

Shaped like an alligator, and just as big (to me), the salamander had smooth glossy red skin with black spots. His round head was as big as mine. He quietly observed me with his two jet black eyes. "Doctor Hookenline... Get him out of here! Please!"

"His name is Red, Stevie. He vill not eat you. You are too big. Make friends. Hee hee hee hee!"

"Doc!" But he just turned and left the room.

Red looked at me for a while, then he came creeping toward me. He was a cautious type. When his soft round snout was close enough, I balled up my fist and popped him right in the nose. He jumped back to the other side of the terrarium.

"Yeah!" I yelled. "Ya want some more? C'mon! C'mon!" And I danced around in my fighter stance, fists up and ready. But Red seemed happy enough to leave me alone. He kept his distance while I walked around checking out the terrarium. Every now and then I would look at him and shake my fist, just to see him flinch.
1311.title: Doctor Hookenline

13111.content:
There was a lid on the terrarium to prevent my escape, but the terrarium had glass walls, giving me a good view of the lab. It had a carpet of moss with a few rocks, a half dozen plants, and a rotting "log" that seemed to be Red's favorite place.

Doctor Hookenline reentered the lab and leaned over my new home. "Chow time, leetle Stevie!" And he sat a bottlecap down on the moss. From the look and smell, it seemed to contain pieces of apple, cheese, and nuts. Next to the cap he placed what was for him a small vial of water. To me it was a jug I could barely lift.

"Doc?" I said. "Am I gonna be big again?"

"Sure, Stevie. Don't you worry. Just one leetle job for you to do. Maybe I pay you extra, huh? Now you get comfortable and rest. I come get you soon,"

"Doc!" I yelled, but he was already out the door.

Red eyed my bottlecap of food. "Get out of here! Go eat a bug!" I yelled at him. He cringed back. Stupid salamander...


"Wake up, Stevie!" It was the Doc again. I stretched. I couldn't believe I had allowed myself to fall asleep with big Red in the cage with me, but he was over at his log doing his own napping.

Doc scooped me up in his goldfish net. I contemplated making a run for it, but I had a vision of getting accidentally squished by one of the Doc's big shoes.

He put me in a glass bowl on the counter. "Okay, try this on, Stevie."

It looked like one of the CO2 cartridges I use with my pellet gun. Attached to it was some gadgetry and a harness. "What is it?" I asked.

"That's your scuba gear. Try it on."

I struggled to get into the harness. "This tank is pretty heavy," I said.

"Don't worry. In the water the buoyancy will make it seem light."

"It's not full of CO2, is it?"

"No! Of course not. Compressed air. Does it fit?"

"The mask is kind of loose."

"Take it off. I fix." And he put me back in the terrarium and left the lab.

I could see that the little "job" he had in mind must involve some underwater work. Scuba diving was something I had done before, but not when I was the size of a toy.
13111.title: Scuba

choices: drop off onto her ear before you go in the hole
or just stay on and get pushed into the dark hole
132.content: You, John, were sleeping at your girlfriend's house (Katelyn). You were both in the bed together, and you woke up early. You decided that you should tell Katelyn about the little toy you found earlier, but you just couldn't find the right way to tell her. Suddenly, you get a brilliant idea. You decided that you should just show her then tell her and give her a little surprise. So, since you remember that Katelyn always goes to the bathroom in the morning and does her morning beauty things. So, you quietly get out of bed and tiptoe to the bathroom. Being only in your boxers, you figure that you're fine. So, you carefully climb onto the bathroom counter and pull out your shrinker. You aim it at yourself and press the button. As you watch the bathroom around you grow bigger and farther away, you just can't wait for Katelyn to see you so small. When you stop shrinking, you're not sure how small you are. You begin to pace while waiting for Katelyn, but yet she still doesn't come. Since it's been so long, and you're getting tired, you look over to the side of the counter and see a fuzzy white thing. It looks rather inviting, so you walk over there, and sit down on it, and begin to doze off sitting there. When you awake, you notice Katelyn is standing right in front of you, and reaches down and picks up the fuzzy thing you are on. As your seat is rocketed into the air, you grab onto it for dear life! You watch Katelyn while you're flying, and notice her yawning and scratching her head. So, basically, you come to the realization that getting her attention in the morning wasn't exactly the brightest idea. Of course, she then brushes her long brown hair behind her ear, and then it really hits you: you're on a Q-tip! As you get closer and closer to the ear, you come up with the best thing your quick-mind can think of...
132.title: Morning surprise

choices: After swimming practice, in the boy's locker room...
133.content:
Your name is John. You have blonde hair and blue eyes. You are a straight A-plus student at Kimkine High School. At 5'6", you aren't very noticeable You are gay and have a boyfriend named Max. He is an amazing swimmer. He stands 6'6" with an athletic build, chestnut hair, and brown eyes.

You have just paid the Shadow an outstanding fee of 2 million gift points. In return, you have recieved a shrink ray that uses rays to shrink people down to a programmed size. You type in one foot and put it away for later.
133.title: John

135.content: (From a female's perspective) You and your best friend had just got dropped off at a huge theatre, now packed with screaming girls, who were waiting for the concert to start. Not wanting to miss any second of it, you both went to your seats in a hurry. You two enjoyed the concert, and were even chosen to go on stage and be sung to by the boy band. After the concert, your friend went outside to wait for her parents. You knew, your mom would be hear any second, and that security was allready kicking people out. However, you wanted to get a drink from the concession stand, because your throat was dry from all that screaming. When you got to the stand, you saw a wired looking man on the phone arguing. He noticed you, and asked what you wanted. When you ordered a small sprite, he nodded his head, and went back to arguing, while fixing your drink. He muttered something under his breath, and went in the area behind the counter ,where you figured he kept all the supplies. While he was back there, you noticed a white cup on the counter, and assumed it was your sprite. You left your money on the counter, and gulped down what was inside, while walking towards the exit. You drunk the drink so fast, you did not realize that it was not sprite. It left a terrible taste in your mouth, and you felt woozy. You immediately blacked out right on the spot. When you woke up everything seemed different. You thought someone had kidnapped you and began to panick. Without thinking you ran until you hit a giant, soft wall, and fell back. It was then that you realized you had shrunk! You began to freak out, but before you had time to think, the giant wall, which happened to be a girl noticed you!
135.title: I just met my favorite band ! Sort of.

1351.content: "Whoa! What was that!", exclaimed the, to you, gigantic female. She wore blue jeans, high heels, and a purple shirt, with the name of the band, Lax Act. Her friends were concerned and asked her what she was talking about. "I just felt something hit my leg." , the girl exclaimed. " You sure you didn't just trip over your 5 inched heals?" Mocked one of her friends. You glanced at the heels, you Had just bumped into, and noticed that you were about the same size as the heel. The girl glanced down, and instantly saw you. She screamed and pointed, as her friends joined in once they saw the tiny girl on the floor. Your ears hurt and your head pounded, from all the screaming. Suddenly, a door swung open, and you saw Lax Act's manager run out. "What happened?!?!.", he shouted in concern, to the three girls. You didn't stick around to be noticed, and bolted for the door, that the manager had left open. Once you were inside, you hid under a make up desk and tried to think about the situation. After a couple minutes your heartbeat was back to normal and you were trying to come up with a plan. However, your thinking plan was over, once you started to hear heavy foot steps come towards you, and you heard several boy's voices. The boy's voices sounded awfully familiar, and you realized you were in the Lax Act's dressing room! " Oh no!", you muttered under your breath. Luckily, they were all ready dressed, and ready to get back on the tour bus. Jason started to practice dance moves, while Chris started to sing. Marcus sat on a couch, drifting off to sleep, while DJ checked his phone for texts. You decided the best thing to do would to be to go up to one of them and ask for help. Since, Jason was dancing, you thought that wouldn't be the best move, and Chris was singing too loud, to you, so you decided to go to either Marcus or DJ.
1351.title: Run!

14.content: Only two stories in this section, so far, but when others are added I will change the numbers to match the titles...
14.title: Somebody finds a shrinker and shrinks somebody els

141.content:
Zor Ztan, leader of the Second Zyzyx Invasion Force, adjusted the vocus on the giant viewscreen in the officer's lounge. "There she is, boys - Earth!"

A collective "Oooooo..." rose up from the Zyzyxian officers. Many ruffled their frills and one junior lieutenant's ear ridges flushed a bright cerulean blue.

Zor Ztan let the reaction die down, then made the announcement they all were waiting for: "The shrinking machine has been reinstalled on what is now the fifth planet."

The officers dipped their frills in approval. Thanks to the First Zyzyxian Invasion Force, the original fifth planet was now in a million pieces. The Second Invasion Force was dedicated to success. The shame of the First Invasion could then be buried in the great Hall of Memory on the home planet - Zyxizaria.

Zor Ztan adjusted the horizontal position control on the viewscreen and the view shifted from the green and blue third planet to the banded clouds of the fifth planet. "You see that giant red spot? That's where the shrinker has been installed. It will be a slow process, but this solar system will eventually be shrunk out of existence."

A junior officer, the same one that had flushed blue, piped up with an impertinent question. "What about the earthlings? Will they not notice?"

Zor Ztan's frill rippled with annoyance at the interruption in the smooth flow of his presentation. "We have determined the earthlings will have enough intelligence to rationalize their experience. They will not believe that they are shrinking. They will develop a theory that the rest of the universe is expanding."

"But that's preposterous!" said the junior officer. "Why would they believe the entire universe was growing bigger when it would be so much simpler to assume they were shrinking?"

Zor Ztan was more than just annoyed now; his frill went rigid with anger.

The junior officer's flush changed from the blue of curiosity to the deep purple of anxiety. Angering Zor Ztan was not the way to get a promotion in rank. He bowed to Zor Ztan and said "I respectfully withdraw my remarks, honored Sir."

Zor Ztan's frill relaxed and refolded itself neatly around his neck. "Your remarks have been deleted from the record. Now let's discuss plans for our return voyage to Zyxizaria. We have decided to take one of earth's two moons with us. Undoubtedly, when they develop astronomy, they will find it puzzling that they are the only planet in their solar system with only one moon. But that will be a small puzzle compared to the "expanding" universe! Haz haz haz haz!"

And the assembled officers laughed with Zor Ztan "Haz haz haz haz!"
141.title: Invasion

142.content:
"What the hail is this?" said Jethro Gumbody as he picked up the queer-looking gun. "I ain't never seen no gun like this before."

It was a strange gun, with a long pink barrel and a purple stock inlaid with intricate gold filigree and engraved with the words "Little ye know, little ye be."

Jethro held the gun to his shoulder. "Little ye know, little ye be. That sounds like something out of the bible." He aimed at a squirrel who happened to be shaking his bushy tail at him and BAM! The squirrel fell out of the tree.

Jethro ran over to pick up the squirrel. "Jumping Jack Flash, looky here now what can this be? That squirrel has done shriveled down to a mouse!"

Jethro looked admiringly at the pink-barreled gun. "Zowee! This here must be one of them there shrinker guns I keep readin' about! Wait until Ma sees this!"

Jethro went hopping and skipping up through the woods until he came to a little log cabin nestled snugly on the side of Blue Man Mountain. He slammed open the door and shouted "Ma! Ma! Look at this!" and thrust the big gun toward a little old lady who was sitting in a rocking chair by the fireplace shelling peas.

"Gracious, Jethro!" she said. "Do you have to come poppin' in here like a bat out of hell? What is that thing?"

"It's a shrinker gun, Ma! I already shrunk me a squirrel. Look!" and he held up the little mouse-sized aquirrel.

Ma squinted at the tiny squirrel. "Jethro, how am I gonna cook that? And even if I did, it ain't near enough to feed you and me. You couldn't find a gun that made things bigger? That would be handy to have. This shrinker gun is plum useless."

Jethro hung his head. "Yore right, Ma. I wasn't thinkin' again."

"Naw, you never do think. Put that useless thing away. Take the shotgun and go kill us somethin' we can eat."

"Yes, Ma" And Jethro put the pink-barreled gun with the fancy purple and gold stock under his bed and thought no more about it.
142.title: Jethro Gumbody Finds A Gun

choices: Teenage girl gets shrunk by her sister
Two girlfriends are in a loving relationship.

1442.title: Two girlfriends are in a loving relationship.

choices: I shrunk my friend and my friend shrunk me
Super Shrinker Shrink Shrinky -- It Works!
15.content:
You find a shrinker, somebody else finds a shrinker, and you shrink each other...

Three stories in this section, so far... When more are added, I will change the choices from numbers to titles.
15.title: You find a shrinker, somebody else finds a shrinke

151.content:
When I saw the ad on the back of the cereal box - "Get an authentic shrink gun FREE!" - I couldn't resist. I sent in the coupon and the P&H money. My friend Bobby did the same,

Two weeks later, Bobby called me. "Stever! I got the gun! It came in the mail today. Come on over."

I jumped on my bike and headed out, stopping by our mailbox on the way. Sure enough, there was my package from the Acme Shrinker Gun Company. I put it under the hold-down straps on the back of my bike and took off for Bobby's house.

He was out in the yard with his shrinker gun and I yelled at him when I was still a half a block away. "I got mine, too!" I screeched to a stop on his driveway and snatched my package out of the hold-down straps. I ripped it open and there was my gun. It was the same orange plastic as Bobby's gun. They looked like 99 cent water pistols.

I looked with raised eyebrows at Bobby. "Are you sure these things work?"

Bobby just smiled a sly smile and reached into his pocket and pulled out an action figure. Or was it? It was moving and I could hear a tiny voice. "Bobby, you moron, change me back right now!" It was alive!

I looked closer at the little naked figure in Bobby's hand. "That's your brother!"

"Yep," Bobby said. He looked like he was pretty proud of his ability to shrink people.

I scratched my chin. "What happened to his clothes?"

Bobby laughed. "I shrunk him when he was in the tub. You should have seen him swimming around in there. He didn't know WHAT happened!"

"Can you change him back?"

Bobby's grin faded. "I don't know. The gun didn't have any instructions with it."

"What's going to happen when your Mom finds out you shrunk Kenny?"

Bobby was looking more worried now. "I don't know. Nothing good, I guess."

"Maybe we should give these guns to the police. Somebody is going to get hurt."

"NO!" said Bobby. "They wouldn't have been on the cereal box if it wasn't okay. We have to keep them."

"Well, I don't like it," I said. "Suppose you dropped Kenny with him so small. The fall would kill him."

"No it wouldn't! Watch!" And Bobby tossed little naked Kenny out onto the grass.

Kenny screamed a tiny little scream as he went sailing through the air... Yiiiiiiiieeee!... But when he hit the grass, he immediately jumped up shaking his miniscule fist and cursing Bobby.

I was surprised. "It doesn't hurt him to fall like that?"

"No," said Bobby. "I've been tossing him around before you got here. Maybe it's because all his molecules have been compressed and now he's like super dense, you know?"

"Maybe," I said.
151.title: In the mail

1511.content:
I examined the little orange plastic shrinker gun in my hand. "So how do you work this thing?"

"You just pull the trigger," said Bobby, gesturing at me with his weapon. A green ray shot out of his gun and hit my left arm. My arm immediately shrunk to a ridiculous size. You ever see those pictures of Tyrannosaurus Rex with the tiny arms? That was my left arm.

"Ooops!" Bobby said.

"You idiot!" I screamed, swinging around my right arm, the one with the gun, and what do you know, accidently shooting Bobby in the leg. No, really. It was accidental. I'm not the type to seek instant revenge.

Bobby went down like the World Trade Center. He didn't have a leg to stand on. Well, he had one leg, but the other leg was verrry short.

Bobby rolled over on the ground and aimed his gun at me. Hate in his eyes. I had a moment to wonder why I picked such hateful people to be friends, then the air was filled with the smell of ozone as we blasted each other with green shrinker rays.

When the smoke cleared, we were standing in the grass, and I do mean "in" the grass because the blades reached up over our heads. "Now you've done it..." Bobby said.

"Me! You're the one that shot first! My arm?"

"That was an accident! You shot me on purpose!"

We heard Kenny calling us. "Hey, where are you guys?"

"Over here!" I yelled. I was glad Bobby and I still had our clothes on when I saw naked Kenny come pushing through the grass. I mean, you feel helpless enough when you are only inches tall. To be naked as well?

Kenny was still angry. "You morons! Stupid idiot jerks!"

I looked at Bobby with one of those "Now what do we do?" looks, but he was looking at me the same way.

"Jerks..." Kenny said, but he didn't sound angry anymore, just disgusted.
1511.title: Male to Male

choices: I was only up to HIS knees
15111.content:
Bobby took one insult too many. He shrunk the already shrunk Kenny and placed him in his pocket.

I said, "Dude! We better find a way to get back to normal or I'm gonna kill you!" Of course I was just being sarcastic.

Bobby laughed lightly, then said "OK, OK, chill. We'll find a way to grow bigger again." Then he took Kenny out of his pocket and looked at him.

Kenny was yelling at both of us, shaking his fist and cursing in a high-pitched squeaky voice. Me and Bobby were laughing like crazy. It was hilarious! Kenny realized he was only entertaining us so he shut up and sat down as he got put back into the pocket.

"OK, down to business. We need to get big again." I checked the shrinker. "Hmmmm... Seems there's one other setting. Dunno what it does, but anything's better than this."

I changed the setting and fired it at Bobby. Smoke went everywhere. Whem the smoke cleared, I gasped. Bobby was....
15111.title: Shrinking Time

choices: shoot Kenny with both of them and see what happens
hits you with both and see what happens
151112.content:
You fire the gun and it just smokes. As the smoke clears, you look up and see that Bobby is HUGE.

OK, I guess this makes you grow, you think. But then you notice somthing .....your friend is still as tall as the grass but YOU SHRUNK MORE!

"WHERE ARE YOU?" booms Bobby's voice.

You cover your ears. You are about up to his knees. "Down here!" you yell.

He looks down. "WHOA! KOOL!!!!" he says as he picks you up.

"PUT ME DOWN!" you scream, but he just ignores you and throws you into the same pocket as Kenny. As your friend makes his way to his house, he is about to go in from his garage when you feel all tingly, then the world again grows around you.

"OH NO!!" You and Kenny are now right next to each other in Bobby's pocket. Bobby finally gets in the house. He sees the other shrinker and decides to....
151112.title: Up To His Knees

choices: Sob and hope Mr.Whiskers forgave you for stepping on his tail the other day
15112.content:
"Ok", I said we have a few options, one we could tell our parents and suffer there wrath
"Or two" I sighed " we could let them think we ran away and possibly be stuck like this forever
'I go for three"Bobby said" Erase the evidence " and with that he sat on the guns and to be blunt crushing them i mean those things were totally destroyed. Kenny punched him in the unmentionables" You idiot, you selfish little kid , i hope you get killed by a dogs i hope you drown in a puddle you stole our only chance you fat
"Kenny" i said putting myself between them" that's enough it's ok we'll fix this ', i heard my voice get higher as i lied through my teeth" What's the worst that could happen?" THAT Bobby yelped pointing at a cat" Oh Mr. Whiskers my cat i forgot about him I gulped " You guys"
Yeah thye replied
RUN
" i'm ging to kill you Bobby " Kenny chanted chasing my chubby friend
"Wait you left me with the cat' i gulped "Bobby" Kenny yelled" I'm going to beat you so bad you'd make a pastry for the CAT"
I began to say" Hey do not kill him" I paused why help Bobby he shrunk me and blamed this on me
"Hey Kenny " i ran up to him"I'll help you!
15112.title: 2 is a bad mamajama

152.content:
I pour out the KooKoo Krunchies into my cereal bowl and a little plastic ring in a cellophane packet falls out. Since I am a ten-year-old girl, I rip open the packet and check out the ring. Nice! It's gold plated and has a sparkling gem in it. A wedding ring?

Saturday morning. Mom in the kitchen. Me in my room playing with my Barbi collection. I have it all -- Barbi cars, Barbi van, Barbi boat, Barbi house, Barbi pool, and of course plenty of clothes and accessories. And I have Ken and Midge and Scooter and Timmy and... Well, I won't bore you with all my dolls' names.

My cell phone plays the Wedding March. "Hello?"

It's my friend Melissa. "Hello, Ellen? What are you doing?"

"Hi, Melissa!" I say. "Come on over! We'll do Barbi."

A half an hour later, Melissa and I are on the floor of my bedroom playing with my Barbies. I notice she has a ring like mine. "KooKoo Krunchies?" I ask her.

"Yeah," she says, and we compare rings. When the rings touch each other there is a blinding flash of light.

"Yikes! What was that?"

"I don't know!"

When we can see again, everything looks different, but somehow familiar. "Melissa! We shrunk!"

"Oh my Gawd!"

Melissa and I are still sitting on the floor of my bedroom, but now we are the same size as Barbi and Ken. Worse still, our clothes did not shrink with us. We stare at each other for a moment, then the same idea occurs to both of us and we grab some of Barbi's clothes and put them on.

"What are we going to do?" says Melissa.

"We need to get Mom! She'll know what to do."
152.title: Playing With Barbi

1521.content:
Melissa and I, wearing our Barbi clothes, walk over to the stairway to the first floor.

"Ellen!" Melissa says. "We can't go down those!"

I have to agree with her. At our current size, it's a long jump from stair to stair. "Maybe we can lower ourselves down with a rope?"

But I can see Melissa is scared to death and since it is now about eighty feet down to the first floor, I don't blame her.

"Call your Mom on your cell phone!"

"Good idea!" and we run back into my bedroom. Unfortunately, my cell phone is on my nightstand, about thirty feet over our heads.

"Now what?" Melissa says.

But I already have a plan. "If we can climb up on the bed, we can reach the nightstand from my pillow."

The bedcovers reach to the floor, so it seems theoretically possible to climb up, but we cannot get a grip on them to pull ourselves up and we give up after a few tries.

"We have to go down the stairs, Melissa."

Her face wrinkles up like she is going to cry. "I can't, Elle." A litle tear rolls out of one eye.

I hug her. "Don't cry. We'll be alright."

There is a sound downstairs of the kitchen door opening, the sound of claws on linoleum, the barking of my dog Suzy.

"It's Suzy!" Melissa's eyes widen. "What if she eats us!"

"Don't be silly, Melissa!" But I am a little worried myself. I remember how Suzy killed a squirrel in the backyard.
1521.title: Getting Desperate

choices: Try to get to get the dog to help
15211.content: Suzy sees you what do you do?
15211.title: Uh-oh

choices: The shrinks scoop up the shrunken you.
You run under their legs. Wonder if shrinker works.
153.content:
"There, there. None of that now. You'll get over it. There's other fish in the sea. Cookies in the jar. Bagger boys in the supermarket. You know what Dr. Schphil says?"

Immobilized in her seat, without the aid of chains or other immobilizing devices, Ana blinked angrily, breaking the immobility clause in the contract she had signed at LabCorp.

How can he just sit there and say that? He just shrank my ex-boyfriend! Behind my back! Without telling me! And now he's taking himself out of my life as well!

She sniffled. "I hate you. Shut up. You suck."

The short, insecure doctor threw another tissue at Ana's lap. He wouldn't look at her anymore.

"If there's ever anything I can do to help...," he said helplessly.

Ana stood up and swiped the Super Shrinky Shrink Shrinker. "Yeah. Don't move."

An alarm blared, startling Ana as she stared at the guy she should never have had anything to do with. Her finger pressed the big red button in the middle of the contraption.

ZRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!

The smoke cleared, the sizzling sounds ceased. Ana looked down at the man's chair, and saw him lying there, as tiny as an M&M.

For a few seconds, Ana felt badly for accidentally shrinking someone.

"You're not so BIG now!"

But then she smiled. Cradled the Super Shrinky Shrink Shrinker in her hands. Turned to go out the door.

And ten shrinks in silver jumpsuits jumped at Ana, waving silvery shrinker things at her.

And then, she was shrunk.
153.title: Super Shrinky Shrink Shrinker--It Works!

choices: Stand around thinking and wasting time.
1532.content:
They loom over you, their silver jumpsuits ballooning out around their ankles, shining like thunderclouds refracting through a silver lake.

A foot nearly crunches you to the floor; as you dart forward, horrified, fueled by a great sense of self-preservation, you see up the jumpsuit.

Those freaky doctors have to wear rubber suits beneath their jumpsuits? How odd. Wouldn't have guessed.

You run down the hall behind the lab workers. It's pretty safe to run down alongside the tile trimming the bottom of the wall--the tiles are a mish-mash of color, and you're wearing that colorful wrap-around skirt you found in your ex-boyfriend's lab quarters.

Just wait till I find you, RKT-09426! I know you weren't in any studies requiring you to wear a skirt! And I'm sure the doc wouldn't have produced the skirt just to make me mad so he could do a study on that too!

Eventually, you reach the end of the hall, and the elevator. A trip that normally would have taken only about thirty seconds took, well, a very long time. You don't know exactly how long, because during the process of being shrunk, your watch slid off your wrist and it's now lying in the doctor's office.

Panting, you look down at the other end of the hall. The doctors are looking for Dr. Brander. They could care less what happened to you--for now.

You see your filtered reflection on the white floor tiles. Apparently, you weren't as camouflaged as you preferred to believe you were.

I've got to find something to wear.

Your tummy rumbles.

I fasted for ten days for the study I was being released from. I really needed that money, too.

What to do.

An ant senses you and crawls up to you, then goes around you. As it passes you, it's legs tickle your side, only it doesn't feel like a tickle, it feels like scratching.

I'm smaller than an ant. I'm stuck on this floor. I'm bound to be discovered soon. Once they capture me, they'll want to run all sorts of tests on me...or maybe they'll just get rid of me altogether. After all, I know some of their secrets...and I was just about to announce that I wanted to leave.

You stare at the ant making its way into a crack that looks like a crevice.

Maybe I could piggyback ride the ant back into the doc's office. I can hide in there and wait till everyone leaves before I change myself back to normal size.

You can decide how to escape the lab itself after you're back to good.
1532.title: Ride the Ant

info.brief_description: Shrinking... A theme you seldom see in Interactive Stories...
info.description:
Since there are so few Interactive Stories on the theme of shrinking, I thought it would be something fresh to do.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can write about anything as long as it's about shrinking. Some growing is permitted, but don't overdo it. After all, this is about SHRINKING, not GROWING.
And no EATING - that's just gross.
Also, no using the words "barnacle", "slate", or "piquant".

And remember - SHRINKING is what it's all about.
